name: Spell of Destruction
storyline: You are Drinn, ex-sorcerer's apprentice, now the chosen one. Only one thing stands between you and becoming the youngest Lore-Adept in the history of the Land: the evil Prime Elemental and its Guardians. Alone and overmatched, you face the portal of the dreaded Castle of Illusions with nothing but your wits, courage, and a supply of spells and fireballs. Enter the castle, if you dare, but remember your quest - find the Prime Elemental and destroy it with but a single spell. Luck go with you as you find and use the final Spell of Destruction.
summary: A isometric action-adventure game with puzzle elements written by Steven Chapman that was originally released as Wizardry in Europe and Australia.
